text: Oscar Walter McConkie Jr. (May 26, 1926 - November 2, 2020) was an American politician and attorney. He was a leader in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). He was the president of the Utah State Senate from 1965 to 1966. He authored several popular books on Latter-day Saint subjects. He was born in Monticello, Utah. McConkie Jr. died on November 2, 2020 from COVID-19 in Salt Lake City, Utah at the age of 94.LDS Democrat and legal giant Oscar McConkie Jr. dies at 94 of COVID complications ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American political writers Category:Lawyers from Utah Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States Category:Writers from Utah Category:Politicians from Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Oscar W. McConkie Jr.
